Guys   This is the real deal. A small tapis joint located on a pedestrian alley a couple of blocks,off Paralaell. pobleSec area. They have individual tapis pieces on sliced French bread for 1 euro each. They count the toothpicks to charge. Selections include salmon on avocado with a dollop of caviar, mossierello and tomato,  calimari, sausage, etc. all for one euro.  Selections were both hot and cold with the hot pieces going into the microwave. Beer was only 1,40. Highest quality and lowest price I have found anywhere.
